fields.description:
{html}

I was playing around with Titanium's Facebook API a bit today, but wasn't very successful. The Kitchen Sink example (Login / Logout) showed the login button, but after entering my credentials the application crashed; trace output is at http://gist.github.com/520810. I noted that the Kitchen Sink code uses the session proxy, so I whipped up a quick sample of my own using apikey and secret. This did not crash, however neither Titanium.Facebook nor the Facebook login button ever receive the login or logout event. I tested on Android (SDK 1.6) on Windows 7.

{html}
fields.summary: Kitchen Sink Facebook examples crash w/ Titanium Mobile 1.4.0 on Android

comments.body: Unable to reproduce on a Samsung Galaxy S2 using TiSDK 2.2.0v20120814103312. Ticket closed.

Unable to reproduce.
Closing as invalid.
